price: Bali huyu amekuja kwa Haki, na amewasadikisha Mitume.
footnotes: Bali Mtume wao amewaletea Tawhidi, Imani ya Mwenyezi Mungu Mmoja, ambayo ndiyo wito wa Mitume wote, naye akasadikisha kwa hivyo wito wa hao Mitume.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
